backend/main.mo: Defines event comparison logic and many public types for competitions, payments, results, and user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend React files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/env.json: Stores the backend canister ID for the frontend environment.
frontend/public/razorpay.config.json: Razorpay configuration including key ID, currency, branding, and theme.
frontend/REGRESSION_SMOKE_TEST_CHECKLIST: Markdown checklist outlining post-deployment regression smoke tests for admin, competitions, leaderboards, and users.
frontend/src/api/errors.ts: Maps various backend error messages to user-friendly strings, falling back to generic messages when needed.
frontend/src/api/queryKeys.ts: Defines stable React Query cache keys and key factories for competitions, profiles, results, and admin data.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and global providers for the React app, including admin and public pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/Competitio: UI component for selecting and editing different competition pricing modes and emitting the corresponding FeeMode value.
Protects admin-only routes by checking authentication and admin status, showing loaders or access denied when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth flow with loading and error recovery behavior.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps protected content and prompts users to log in if unauthenticated, showing a loading state during initialization.
frontend/src/components/competition/Comp: Displays a clickable competition card with name, dates, status, event count, and participant limit, navigating to details on click.
Main layout with header, navigation, auth controls, and responsive mobile menu, integrating admin visibility and routing.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Lead: Renders a leaderboard table showing ranks, competitors, Ao5 scores, and individual solve times with profile navigation.
frontend/src/components/profile/Payments: Displays the user's payment history with loading, error, empty states, and sortable payment cards.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileM: Provides a dropdown menu for authenticated users showing profile info, navigation, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal dialog for creating a user profile by submitting email and display name with validation and async mutations.
frontend/src/components/solve/Inspection: Manages a 15-second inspection timer with penalty and DNF handling, showing scramble and phase transitions.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveCompl: Shows a completion screen after all solves with navigation options and instructions for submitting video evidence.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveTimer: Interactive solve timer component that tracks time, displays running state, and triggers onComplete when stopped.
frontend/src/components/system/ActorInit: UI error component showing initialization failures with retry and troubleshooting steps.
frontend/src/config/razorpay.ts: Loads Razorpay payment config from a JSON file with caching and default fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBeforeUnloadWarnin: Warns users before leaving the page when enabled by attaching a beforeunload handler.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current user's profile using the backend actor with loading and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useGoLiveAttempt.ts: Manages multiâ€‘step deployment simulation with preflight checks, step updates, errors, and diagnostic logs.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/logout logic, and persistent identity management via AuthClient.
Blocks browser back navigation when enabled by confirming before allowing route changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for competitions, results, payments, and other backend interactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/src/lib/ao5.ts: Defines leaderboard types and computes average-of-5 times with DNF handling and penalty logic.
frontend/src/lib/competitionPricing.ts: Provides helpers to detect paid competitions and format pricing details from various fee modes.
frontend/src/lib/csv.ts: Exports competition results to a downloadable CSV file, formatting attempts and escaping fields.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into human-readable dates.
frontend/src/lib/goLiveDiagnostics.ts: Simulates deployment steps with status callbacks, random failures, and error normalization utilities.
frontend/src/lib/goLivePreflight.ts: Runs preflight checks for env files, payment config, network connectivity, and build artifacts.
frontend/src/lib/razorpay.ts: Loads the Razorpay script and opens a configured checkout modal using provided order details.
frontend/src/lib/solveSession.ts: Manages tab-scoped solve session tokens using sessionStorage for store, retrieve, and clear operations.
frontend/src/lib/timeUtils.ts: Formats millisecond times into seconds or returns DNF for invalid times.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCompetitio: Displays all competitions for admins with options to create, edit, lock/unlock, and delete. Handles related mutations and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCreateComp: Provides a form for admins to create competitions with event selection, scramble input, and fee configuration. Validates inputs before submitting the creation request.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEditCompet: Allows admins to edit an existing competition, preloading its data including scrambles, events, and fees. Supports updating all fields with validation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminGoLivePage: Runs and displays deployment steps for going live, including preflight checks, progress indicators, and diagnostics download/copy options.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLandingPag: Shows the admin dashboard with navigation to user, competition, and results management, plus quick actions for creating competitions and deployment.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminResultsPag: Admin page for selecting competitions/events, viewing results, toggling visibility, recalculating leaderboards, and exporting results to CSV.
Admin interface for listing users and performing actions like block, unblock, delete, reset competition status, and view solve history.
frontend/src/pages/CompetitionDetailPage: Displays competition details, handles event selection, payment via Razorpay, and starting a solve session.
Fetches and lists competitions grouped by status with cards for running, upcoming, and completed events.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Shows leaderboard for a selected competition event, computing ranks and Ao5 from fetched results.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardsHubPage.t: Lists all competitions with status badges and links to their leaderboards; requires authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to view and edit their profile and access payment history.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProfilePage.tsx: Displays a public competitor profile with stats and grouped event results.
frontend/src/pages/SolveFlowPage.tsx: Manages the timed solve flow for a competition attempt, handling inspection, solving, submission, and session recovery. Uses queries and session state to progress through attempts and block navigation until completion.
frontend/src/types/admin.ts: Defines admin-side types for result input, public profile info, and user summaries including blocked status and profile fields.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Extends backend-generated types for competitions, results, leaderboards, profiles, and session state, matching Motoko definitions.
frontend/src/types/domain.ts: Provides event labels, a list of all supported events, and the default event used throughout the app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, retrieving, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing platform features, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature statuses.
